source_text: Manggawa kad gilig na samput na kapag saramay impansasaip mo na panagkawitan ya asul ya abel.
target_text: Dinan yeng telasingsing a gewa king asul a tela ing mumunang diling piliego king balang kapisaniban.

source_text: Pansasaip mon daiten so limara tan ontan met so gawaen mod saray limara.
target_text: Pisanibsaniban yu la ding limang piliego at makanyan munaman ding lima.

source_text: Gawam a nampapara so kabaleg da; labinapat a yarda so dokey da tan duaran yarda so benlag da.
target_text: Piparaparehuan yu la sukad deting apulung kapiliego; labing apat a yarda la king kaba at aduang yarda king lapad.

source_text: Diad paway na Sankasantosan a Pasen iliram ed pireg na baybay a dapag na Tulda so lamisaan tan iliram ed pireg na abalaten a dapag na Tulda so panangipatoonan na lamparaan.
target_text: King lual na ning Kabanal-banalan a Lugal karin ye ibili ing lamesa, king dane norti ning Tolda, at ibili ye ing tumpakan sulu king lele na ning dane mauli.

source_text: Igawaan mo so dalem na Tuldan Ayamay Katawan na samploran kurtina a pinon linen.
target_text: Igawa yu kung Tolda, ing Toldang pituknanganan ku.

source_text: Say lolooban na Tulda et igawaan mo na sakey a kurtina a pinon linen; asul, purpura, tan ambalanga so tinebey da tan bordaan mo.
target_text: Para king pasbul a palub king Tolda, gawa kayung metung a tabing king mapinung linen a linalang asul, muradu, at malutung lana a mipalamutian king miyayaliwang burda.

source_text: Para sayan kurtina manggawa ka na limaran lusek ya akasia ya inokupan na balituk tan wala ray nipeket a balituk a panagkawit; manggawa ka met na limaran gansan dapan a toonan na sarayan lusek.
target_text: Para pisabitan kaniting tabing, gawa kayung limang asias king dutung a akasia a belutanan gintu, at dinan yu lang sabitan a gintu; gawa kayung limang talpakan a tangsu para pitukluanan da reti.

source_text: Amin a tabla nepeg a wala ray kagur dan amin.
target_text: Dinan yu la ngan mitsa ding tabla.

source_text: Say kurtina so ketegan na Masanton Pasen tan say Sankasantosan a Pasen.
target_text: Ing tabing atyu king pilatan da kanita ning Banal a Lugal ampon ning Kabanal-banalan a Lugal ya ing maging peka partisyun.

source_text: Itopim ya idobli so kumanem a kurtina diad tagey na arap na Tulda.
target_text: Ing kanam dang piliego deti ya ing pagdobli yu bilang peka bubung na ning pasbul ning Tolda.

source_text: Asul, purpura, tan ambalanga so tinebey da tan bordaan mo ra na saray kirubin.
target_text: Gamitanan yeng apulung kapiliegong linen a linala king asul, muradu, at malutung lana. Burdahan yu la karing larawan da ring kerubin.

source_text: Nepeg ya onyay pakagawa na duaran tabla a sikaray duaran sokung.
target_text: Makanyan yu lang gawan ding mingatbang tabla karing aduang paniuluk.

source_text: Say pinagkaalar et limamplon yarda so karokey to, duamplo tan liman yarda so kaawang to, duara tan kapalduay yarda so kaatagey to.
target_text: Kailangan ing lima yang pulung yarda king kaba ing sukad ning kabilugan a patyu; aduang pulu't limang yarda ya king lapad, at adua ampon kapitnang yarda ya king katas.

source_text: Amin a kagawaan ya ikanad dalem na Tulda tan amin a palpal na Tulda tan saray palpal na pinagkaalar et nepeg a gansa ra.
target_text: Kailangan la ngan tangsu ding sablang kasangkapan a magamit kilub ning Tolda at ding sablang tulus ning Tolda at ning patyu na.

source_text: isabit ira ed duamplon gansan lusek a nipatoon ed duamplon dapan a gansa, tan wala ray pilak a panagkawit tan sangal da.
target_text: isabit karing aduang pulung asias a tangsu a makasulpak karing aduang pulung sulpakan a tangsu, at karing baras at sabitan a pilak.

source_text: Gawam met so onya ed baybay a dapag na pinagkaalar.
target_text: Makanyan munaman ing gawan yu king dane norti na ning patyu.

source_text: Diad dapag a sagur say benlag na saray kurtina et duamplo tan liman yarda; wala ray samploran lusek tan samploran dapan.
target_text: Kailangan ing aduang pulu't limang yarda la king kaba ding tabing king dane albugan, at atin lang apulung asias a maki apulung sulpakan.

source_text: Say Tuldan Ayaman na Katawan et igawaan mo na saray pinon linen a kurtina a pinagkaalar to.
target_text: Igawa ya namang patyu ing Tolda. Padurutnan ye karing tabing a gewa king linen a mapinu.

source_text: Diad dapag a bokig a kawalaay lolooban, say benlag na pinagkaalar to et duamplo tan liman yarda met.
target_text: King dane aslagan, nung nu ya karin ing pasbul, ing peka tabing na karin, gawan ya namang aduang pulu't limang yarda king lapad.

source_text: Diad kapag diking na lolooban say benlag na saray kurtina et pitora tan kapalduan yarda; wala ray taloran lusek tan taloran dapan.
target_text: Kailangan ing mika tabing a tia pitu at kapitnang yarda king misusumangid nang dane ning pasbul a maki titlung asias at titlung sulpakan.

source_text: Diad lolooban say karokey na kurtina to et samploran yarda a pinon linen; asul, purpura, tan ambalanga so tinebey to tan bordaan mo.
target_text: Para king pasbul kailangan ing mika tabing a apulung yarda king kaba a gewa king linen a mapinu at maki kule asul, muradu, at malutung lana, at ating palamuting burda.

source_text: Manggawa ka na gansan parilya tan peketan mo na apatiran gansan liken iray suyok to.
target_text: Gawa kayu namang sala-salang tangsu at dinan yeng apat a pasingsing a tangsu karing apat nang suluk.

source_text: Amin da ray lusek na pinagkaalar et nepeg ya atoop ira na saray sangal a pilak, say panagkawit da et pilak, tan saray dapan da et gansa.
target_text: Pitaidtaid la ding sablang asias a makapadurut king patyu karing baras a pilak. Kailangan ing pilak la naman at tangsu ding sabitan da at ding sulpakan.

source_text: Saray tabla so ikanam ed panggawam ed altar, tan gawam a longugan, onung na planon impanengneng kod sika diad tagey na palandey.
target_text: Gawan yeng kalubkuban ing altar at daligan yeng tabla; gawan ye agpang king planung pepakit ku keka king bunduk.

source_text: Manggawa ka na saray pinagkasaklur ed toktok na apatiran suyok to. Mitekep ira ed altar tan naokupan na gansa.
target_text: Mikabit kayung apat a sagu king babo da ring apat nang suluk, ita sanang makatuglung la mismu king altar, at balutanan yeng tangsu ing kabilugan.

source_text: Manggawa ka na saray palangganan pananginay dapul, tan manggawa ka na saray karyo, saray yaung, saray tinidor, tan saray palangganan pananginay ngalab.
target_text: Gawa kayu namang pilulanan king abung mituluanan taba. Gawa kayu namang pala, palanggana, maragul a tinedor, at pipatawan api.

source_text: Iganggan mo ray Israelita a mangyakar irad sika na sankaabigan a larak na oliba ya onkanad lamparaan, pian akaselsel lawas.
target_text: Iyutus mu karing memalen na ning Israel ing pagdala ra kang larung olibo a alang samut para karing sulu ban manatili lang milalablab.

source_text: Di Aaron tan saray anak ton lalaki et sikaray mangasikaso na lamparaan ed dalem na Tuldan ayaman ko diad paway na kurtina a walad arap na Kaban na Sipanan.
target_text: I Aaron at ding anak nang lalaki ilang mibili king sulu kilub na ning kanakung Tolda nung nu ku atyu ketang lual na ning tabing a atyu king arapan na ning Kaban ning Kasunduan.

source_text: Iliram ed silong na pinagkakuadro na altar so parilya, pian nasabi to so kapaldua na altar.
target_text: Ibili ye iting sala-salang tangsu king lele na ning altar; ita sanang mamabut ya king kapitna na ning katas ning altar.

source_text: Manggawa ka na saray akasian tiken a panagsakbatan, okupan mo ra na gansa,
target_text: Igawa yeng bitbitan ing altar king dutung a akasia; balutanan yeng tangsu.

source_text: tan no sakbaten so altar, isolung mod saray liken a nipeket ed saray diking to.
target_text: Ipasulud yu la deting bitbitan karing telasingsing na ning altar; ita sanang mingatba la king altar potang bibitbitan de.

source_text: Manggawa ka na altar ya akasia.
target_text: Gawa kayung altar king dutung a akasia.

source_text: Gansa ra yan amin a kagawaan.
target_text: Tangsu ing gamitan yung materialis para kareti ngan.

source_text: Diad arap ko, say lamparaan et nepeg a mandarlang manlapud labi ya anggad kabwasan.
target_text: Sukat lang milalablab ding sulu neng bengi angga itang kabukasan karin king arapan ku.

source_text: Diad dapag ya abalaten say karokey na kurtina et limamplon yarda,
target_text: Gawan yu lang limang pulung yarda king kaba ding tabing king dane mauli, at

source_text: Nepeg a kuadrado; duara tan kapalduan mitro so karokey to tan duara tan kapalduan mitro so kaawang to, tan sakey tan kapalduan mitro so kaatagey to.
target_text: Kailangan ing kuadradu ya; pitu at kapitnang talampakan ya king kaba, pitu at kapitnang talampakan ya king lapad, at apat ampon kapitnang talampakan ya king katas.

source_text: Saray kurtina et nepeg a pino ran linen tan gansa ray dapan na lusek.
target_text: Kailangan la ngang gewa king linen a mapinu ding tabing at pawa la ngan tangsu ding sulpakan da.

source_text: Apatiray lusek to a nipatoon ed apatiran dapan.
target_text: Kailangan ing atin yang apat a asias, at apat a sulpakan iting tabing.

source_text: Sayan ganggan et nepeg a sumpalen ya anggad angga na saray Israelita tan saray kabyangay boleg da.
target_text: Iti kautusan yang sukat dang tuparan king kapilan pa man ding Israelita ampon ding lahi ra.

source_text: Ipeket mo ra ed saray balabal na takeb na ipod, ta sikaray pakanudnunotan ed saray boleg na Israel.
target_text: Ikabit mu la deti karing tiranti na ning efod bilang e pamangalinguan karing labing aduang tribu na ning Israel.

source_text: Manggawa ka na saray kawes ya antikey so taklay, saray abel a balabal, tan saray sakub na toktok na olo para saray lalakin anak nen Aaron, pian napaalsay nengneng da tan say kagalangan da.
target_text: Pagawa ka namang kamisa, paha, at turban para karing anak nang Aaron ban mika dangal la at masanting lalawan.

source_text: Nepeg a kuadrado tan dinobli; siamiran pulgada so karokey to tan siamiran pulgada so benlag to.
target_text: Kailangan ing kuadradu ya at mitataklub ya; siam yang pulgada king kaba at siam yang pulgada king lapad.

source_text: Si Aaron et nepeg ya isolung to ya ed muling to, pian siak a Katawan et awaten koy amin a bagat ya isaklang ed siak na saray Israelita, anggaman a wala ray lingon nagawa na totoo diad pangisaklang da.
target_text: Isulud neng Aaron iti king kanuan na ban aku, ing Ginu , kaku la ngan tanggapan ding ain a yayain da kanaku ding Israelita, agyang pang makarapat lang kamalian ding tau king pamiyain da kareti.

source_text: Manggawa ka na babalin apis na pagew na Pangulon Pari, ta ikana tod pangamta na linaway Dios.
target_text: Pagawa ka namang metung a takap ning salu a isulud na ning Pekapun a Pari potang sabian na nung nanu ing kaburian ku, ing Ginu .

source_text: Isinger mo ya na asul a koldon diad arap na turban.
target_text: Itali me iti king arap ning turban king kapamilatan na ning metung a lasung asul.

source_text: tan duaran kadina a puron balituk a singa nilobir a koldon, tan ipeket mo ra ed saray panangipatoonan.
target_text: at aduang kwintas a gintung puru a linubid anting panali, at ikabit mu la reti karing aduang engaste.

source_text: Manggawa ka na duaran balituk a panangipatoonan,
target_text: Pagawa ka namang aduang engasteng gintu

source_text: Manggawa ka na arkos a puron balituk tan tatakan mo na Nisaklang ed Katawan .
target_text: Gawa kang metung a palamuting tsapang gintung puru at idukit mu kaniti ing: Makatalaga king Ginu .

source_text: Paawit moy agim ya Aaron tan saray lalakin anak to a di Nadab, Abiu, Eleazar, tan Itamar.
target_text: Payaus me ing kapatad mung i Aaron at ding anak nang lalaki, i Nadab, Abihu, i Eleazar, at i Itamar.

source_text: Paitatak mod marunong a platiro diad duaran bato so kangaranan na saray lalakin anak nen Jacob, tan ipeket mo rad balituk a panangipatoonan.
target_text: Ipadukit mu la deting lagyu ra king metung a magaling a platero at kaybat ipatampuk mu la karing engasteng gintu.

source_text: manlapud sankatakkenan ya anggad sankalangweran; anemiran ngaran so itatak mod sakey a bato tan anemirad sananey.
target_text: agpang king pamidalan-dalan da king idad, anam king metung a onyx at anam king kadua.

source_text: Mangala ka na duaran baton onisi tan itatak mod sikara so kangaranan na labinduan lalakin anak nen Jacob,
target_text: Kuma kang aduang batung onyx at idukit mu la kareti ding lagyu da ring labi nang aduang anak Israel,

source_text: Paawit mo ray amin a marunong a mandait ya initdan ko na karunongan, tan ibagam ed sikara ya igawaan day Aaron na kawes to, ta sikatoy isaklang a sakey a pari a manlingkur ed siak.
target_text: Payaus mu la ding sablang talapagobrang dininan kung mangasanting a pangamat king pamanayi, at sabian mu karela king ila ding gawa king imalan nang Aaron ban akua na nang mitalaga bilang pari a sumuyu kanaku.

source_text: Say balibaliy inkalagan balkes ya agawa met ed balituk, asul, purpura, tan ambalangan tinebey, pinon linen, tan abordaan et nepeg ya ipeket ed ipod pian mansaip ira.
target_text: Dinan dia namang metung a sinturun a mapinu ing mesabing efod; ita sanang makataid ya at maging dake ne ning efod.

source_text: Manggawa ray duaran balabal na takeb a sikaray pangipeketan na duaran samput na ipod.
target_text: Dinan deng aduang tiranti king mingatba ban malyari yang isakbit karing pago.

source_text: Nepeg a diad panggawa ray ipod, ikana ray balituk, asul, purpura, tan ambalangan tinebey, pinon linen tan abordaan.
target_text: Kailangan yang magawa ing efod king lanang asul, muradu, at malutu, sinulad a gintu, mapinung linen, at palamutian deng burda.

source_text: Saray marunong a mandait et nepeg ya ikana ray balituk, asul, purpura, tan ambalangan tinebey, tan pinon linen.
target_text: Kailangan king deting manayi gumamit lang lanang asul, muradu, at malutu, sinulad a gintu, at mapinung linen.

source_text: Si Aaron isolung to yan kawes no manlingkur a sakey a pari.
target_text: Isulud neng Aaron iting barung makaba potang gagampanan na ing katungkulan na bilang pari.

source_text: Say antikey so taklay a kawes nen Aaron et gawam ed pinon linen tan gawam met ed pinon linen so turban; manggawa ka met na abordaan ya abel a balabal.
target_text: Gawan ye king mapinung linen ing kamisa nang Aaron at gawa kayu namang turban king mapinung linen, at antimu rin metung a pahang mipalamutian burda.

source_text: Ibagam ed sikara a manggawa ray sakey ya apis na pagew, sakey ya ipod, sakey ya andokey a kawes, sakey a binordaan a kawes ya antikey so taklay to, sakey a turban, tan sakey ya abel a balabal.
target_text: Sabian mu karela king gawa lang metung a takap-salu, metung a efod, metung a barung makaba, metung a kamisang birdahan, metung a turban, at metung a paha.

source_text: Diad liber-liber na saloy to peketan mo na saray granada a ginawad asul, purpura, tan ambalangan tinebey, tan isaletsalet mo ray kampanilya a balituk.
target_text: Makapadurut king lele nang laylayan lalam, paburda meng granadang asul, muradu, at malutung lana; ibangkilas mu la karing kampaniliang gintu.

source_text: Si Aaron tan saray anak to et nepeg ya isolung da ra ya lawas no onloob ira ed Tuldan Ayamay Katawan odino no onasingger irad altar a manlingkur a papari diad Masanton Pasen, pian ag ira ompatey lapud pangipanengneng dad laman da.
target_text: Kailangan ing isulud na lang Aaron deti at ding anak nang lalaki neng mamarap la kanaku kilub na ning Toldang tuknangan ku o neng lalapit la king altar ban gampanan da ing karelang pangapari kilub ning Banal a Lugal, at ban e la mangamate uli na ning kalubasan da.

source_text: Igawaan mo ra na potut a pantalon a linen; say karokey to et manlapud balangbang ya anggad ulpo, pian ag nanengneng so laman da.
target_text: Ipagawa mu la naman salol a makuyad, linen munaman ing gamitan mu; ita sanang mitakpan la katawan manibat king awakan angga karing puad da.

source_text: Nepeg a walay lewlew a pangisolungan na olo, tan diad gilig na lewlew itdan na patalker a singa lewlew na kawes pian ag napilat.
target_text: Dinan yang busbus para pisuluran king buntuk, at sukat yang dinan uriang inabal iting busbus a kalupa na ning talab ban e ya magisi.

source_text: Isolung mo ra yan kawes ed kinen agim ya Aaron tan saray anak ton lalaki.
target_text: Ipasulud mu la deting imalan kang Aaron a kapatad mu at karing anak nang lalaki.

source_text: Manggawa ka na saray kawes na pari a para si agim ya Aaron, pian napaalsay nengneng to tan say kagalangan to.
target_text: Ipagawa meng imalan pari i Aaron a kapatad mu; imalan a munie dangal at sintingan king obra na.

source_text: Peketan mo na apatiran karasig na mabmablin bato; diad ononan dasig peketan mo na sakey a baton rubi, sakey a topasio, tan sakey a garniti;
target_text: Engastian meng apat a kahilerang mal a batu; king mumunang hilera, mikabit kang metung a rubi, metung a topasyo, at metung a garnet.

source_text: diad kumadwan dasig, peketan mo na sakey a baton ismiralda, sakey a sapiro, tan sakey a diamanti;
target_text: King kaduang hilera, mikabit kang metung a esmeralda, metung a safiro, at metung a diamante.

source_text: diad kumatlon dasig, peketan mo na sakey a baton hasinto, sakey ya agata, tan sakey ya amatista;
target_text: King katlung hilera, mikabit kang metung a turquoise, metung a agata, at metung a ametista.

source_text: diad kumapat a dasig, peketan mo na sakey a baton birilo, sakey a kornalina, tan sakey a haspi.
target_text: King kapat a hilera, mikabit kang metung a berilo, metung a onyx, at metung a haspe.

source_text: Say intiron andokey a kawes ya onlatup ed ipod et nepeg a gawaen ed asul ya abel.
target_text: Kailangan yang magawa king asul a lana ing barung makaba a susulud babo ning efod.

source_text: Diad kapag sakey ed sarayan labinduan bato say sakey a ngaran na lakin anak nen Jacob et itatak; sikaray pakanudnunotan ed saray labinduan tribu na Israel.
target_text: Ing balang metung kareting mesabing batu sukat yang dukitanan metung karing lagyu da ring anak nang Jacob bilang kapigaganakan karing tribu na ning Israel.

source_text: Manggawa ka na saray puron balituk a kadina a para apis na pagew, a singa nilobir a koldon.
target_text: Gawa ka namang aduang tali king gintung puru para kaniting takap-salu a linubid anting panali.

source_text: Manggawa ka na duaran singsing a balituk tan ipeket mo ra ed saray tagey a suyok na apis na pagew,
target_text: Gawa ka namang aduang telasingsing a gintu at ibili mu la karing mingatba nang suluk babo ning takap-salu.

source_text: tan ipeket mo ray duaran balituk a koldon ed sayan duaran singsing.
target_text: Isulud mu la kareting telasingsing ding aduang taling gintu.

source_text: Ipeket mo ray duaran samput na koldon ed saray duaran panangipatoonan, insan ipeket mo rad arap na saray balabal na ipod.
target_text: Ikabit mu la ding mingatba rang danggut ding taling gintu karing aduang engasteng gintu ban mitaid la karing tiranti na ning efod banda king arap.

source_text: Insan ka manggawa na duaran singsing a balituk tan ipeket mo rad saray leksab a suyok na apis na pagew, diad akindalem na samput ya abay na ipod.
target_text: Gawa kang aduang telasingsing a gintu at ikabit mu la karing adua nang suluk lalam ning takap-salu king lilip nang makalub a malapit king efod.

source_text: Manggawa ka ni na duaran balituk a singsing tan ipeket mo ra ed leksab na arap na duaran balabal na ipod, diad abay na tupig tan tagtagey na balibaliy inkalagan balkes.
target_text: Gawa ka pang aduang telasingsing a gintu at ikabit mu la king lalam king tulid da ring aduang tiranti na ning efod, malapit king pisuglungan a atyu babo ning sinturun a mapinu pangayabal a makatuglung king efod.

source_text: Saray singsing na apis na pagew isinger mo ra ed saray singsing na ipod, pian say apis na pagew mansiansiad tagtagey na balkes tan ag onlokak. Asul a koldon so pangisinger mo.
target_text: Itali mu la ding telasingsing ning takap-salu karing telasingsing na ning efod king kapamilatan na ning taling asul ban manatili ya ing takap-salu babo na ning binurdahan a sinturun ning efod, at e na akuang mikawani king efod.

source_text: No onloob si Aaron ed Masanton Pasen, isolung to so apis na pagew ya akaitatakan na kangaranan na saray boleg na Israel, pian siak a Katawan et nanunotan ko lawas iray totook.
target_text: Potang lulub ya i Aaron king Banal a Lugal, isulud ne iting takap-salu a midukitanan karing lagyu da ring tribu na ning Israel ban kanita, aku, ing Ginu , aganaka ke ing kanakung balen.

source_text: Ipeket mod apis na pagew so Urim tan Tummim, pian si Aaron et sankaawit to ra no onloob ed pasen a kawalaan ko.
target_text: Ibili mu ne man ing Urim at ing Tumim king takap-salu ban darala na lang Aaron potang lulub ya king banal kung arapan.

source_text: Diad saratan a panaon nepeg ton isolung lawas so sayan apis na pagew, pian naamtaan to so linawak para saray Israelita.
target_text: Karing penandit a anti kareti sukat neng parating susulud iting takap-salu ban siguradu nang abalu nung nanu ing kaburian ku para karing memalen na ning Israel.

source_text: Ipeket mo ra ya ed panangipatoonan a balituk.
target_text: Pawa la ngan sanang maka engasteng gintu deting batu.

source_text: Insan mo ra ikonsagra tan isaklang diad panlanam ed sikara na larak na oliba, pian makapanlingkur iran papari ed siak.
target_text: Kaybat, ordinan mu la at italaga king kapamilatan na ning pamitugtug mung larung olibo karela ban kanita makasuyu la kanaku bilang pari.

source_text: Sikato yay mansiansian tontonen a nepeg a sumpalen di Aaron tan saray kabyangay boleg to.
target_text: Maging metung ya iting tuntunan king kapilan pa man para kang Aaron at karing maging lahi na.

source_text: Nepeg dan gawaen ira yan kawes na pari a para si agim ya Aaron tan saray lalakin anak to, ta sikaray manlingkur a papari ed siak.
target_text: Gawan da la reting imalan pari para kang Aaron at para karing anak nang lalaki ban makasuyu na la kanaku bilang pari.

source_text: No onla ed kawalaan ko diad Masanton Pasen odino no ontaynan diman, narengel so tanul na saray kampanilya, et diad ontan ag ompatey si Aaron.
target_text: Potang lulub ya king Banal a Lugal o kaya potang lulual ya maramdam la ding kampanilia. E ya mate king anti kaniting paralan.

source_text: Diad onya si Aaron sakbaten tod saray takeb to so kangaranan da, pian siak a Katawan et nanunotan ko lawas iray totook.
target_text: King anti kaniting paralan, darala na lang parating Aaron karing pago na ding lagyu ra ban kanita naman, aku, ing Ginu , e ku la kalinguan kapilan man bilang kanakung balen.

source_text: Ibiig mo rad saray Israelita, ta sikaray manlingkur a papari ed siak.
target_text: Ikalilua mu la karing memalen na ning Israel ban sumuyu la kanaku bilang pari.

source_text: Ikanam iray singa saray inkanam ed impanggawam na ipod: balituk, asul, purpura, tan ambalangan tinebey, tan pinon linen.
target_text: Gamitan ing telang kalupa na ning megamit king efod, at palamutian ya naman ketang burdang kalupa na ning king efod.

source_text: Alam so sananey a karniro tan ibagam ed kinen Aaron tan saray anak to ya itapew dad olo to iray kalimaan da.
target_text: Kuanan me ing metung pang lalaking tupa, itang megamit king pamitalaga. Kaybat, ipatung na la ding gamat nang Aaron at ding anak na king buntuk ning tupa.

source_text: Itoon mod olo to so turban tan isinger mod saya so masanton tanda na impangisaklang ya akaitatakay, Nisaklang ed Katawan .
target_text: Itumpak me king buntuk na ing turban at itali me kaniti itang sagradung simbulu na ning pangatalaga na nung nu makadukit ing Makatalaga king Ginu .

source_text: Naamtaan da a siak so Katawan a Dios da ya angipaway ed sikara ed Egipto, pian makapanayam ak ed kawalaan da.
target_text: Abalu ra kanita king aku ing Ginung karelang Dios a milual karela karin Ehipto ban akua kung makapanuknangan kayabe ra.

source_text: Manayam ak ed kawalaan na saray Israelita tan siak so Dios da.
target_text: Manuknangan ku libutad ning balen Israel, at aku ing maging Dios da.

source_text: Gawaen kon masanto so Tulda tan say altar, tan gawaen ko met a masanto si Aaron tan saray anak ton lalaki, pian makapanlingkur iran papari ed siak.
target_text: Gawan keng banal ing Toldang tuknangan ku ampon ing altar, at ibukud ke i Aaron at ding anak nang lalaki ban sumuyu la kanaku bilang pari.

source_text: Diman ak miabetan ed saray Israelita, tan say kagalangan ko pagmaliwen ton masanto iman a pasen.
target_text: Karin ke pakitagpuan ing balen Israel at ing masala nang aslag ning panga-atyu ku ya ing munie kabanalan king lugal a ita.

source_text: balabalan mo rad awak tan isinger mod kaoloan da so sakub na toktok na olo.
target_text: babatan mu la karing paha at itali mu la ring turban king buntuk da.

source_text: Diad amin a panaon ya onsabi, sayan bagat a popoolan et nepeg ya ibagat ed arap ko diad lolooban na Tuldan Ayamay Katawan .
target_text: Sukat gampanan alang patugut iti king sablang panaun bilang ain-a-durulukan king arapan ku keta king tulid ning pasbul ning Toldang tuknangan ku.

source_text: Iyakar mod arap na Tuldan Ayamay Katawan so bakan kalakyan tan ibagam ed kinen Aaron tan saray lalakin anak to ya itapew dad olo to iray kalimaan da.
target_text: Idala me ing toro arap ning Toldang tuknangan ku at sabian mu kang Aaron at karing anak na ing itumpak da la ring gamat da king buntuk ning toro.

source_text: Ibagat yod labi so kumadwan kordiro, tan tekepan yo na singa karakel na arina, larak na oliba, tan alak a singa samay bagat ed kabwasan.
target_text: Iyain ye ing kaduang biserung tupa potang malapit nang datang ing bengi at kayabe na iyain yu naman ing arina, larung olibo, at alak a kasing dakal na nitang king abak.

source_text: Say ononan kordiro tekepan yo na sakey kilon pinon arina a nikames ed sakey a litron puron larak na oliba tan sakey a litron alak a sikatoy sakey a bagat.
target_text: Kayabe ning mumunang biserung tupa kailangan kayung miyain aduang librang arinang primera klasi a singkapan kulang king metung a litrung larung olibo a alang samut. Mitugtug kayu namang kulang king metung a litrung alak bilang ain a tutugtug.

source_text: Ibagat yod kabwasan so sakey a kordiro tan diad labi say sakey.
target_text: Iyain ye ing metung neng abak at ing metung neng sisilim na.

source_text: Inagew-agew ed anggan kapigan a panaon, mangibagat kayo na duaran kordiro ya ataonan la.
target_text: King sablang panaun, mibili kayung ain king altar aldo-aldo, aduang biserung tupa a pabanua tua.

source_text: Patey mod arapan ko so baka diad lolooban na Tulda.
target_text: Paten me kanita mu rin king banal kung arapan ing toro king tulid nang pasbul ning Toldang tuknangan ku.

source_text: Gawam ya ed loob na pitoran agew.
target_text: Daptan mu iti balang aldo kilub ding pitung aldo.

source_text: Mangala kay daiset a dala na bakan kalakyan tan diad panamegley na tamorom iponaris mod saramay pinagkasaklur na altar.
target_text: Kuma kang ditak king daya ning toro at king metung mung taliri ikaskas mu iti karing sagu ning altar.

source_text: Inagew-agew a nepeg mon ibagat so sakey a karniron kalakyan, pian napaandi so kasalanan; saya et linisan to so altar.
target_text: Miyain kang metung a toro balang aldo bilang ain para king pangapatawaran ning kasalanan. Iti ing makalinis king altar.

source_text: Diad loob na dugarugan pitoran agew gawam so sirimonya na pangikonsagra ed kinen Aaron tan saray anak to onung na ingganggan ko.
target_text: Gampanan mu ing seremonia ning ordinasyun nang Aaron at ding anak nang lalaki kilub ding pitung aldo antimo nung makananu kung penabilin keka.

source_text: No walay kerad kabwasan a karni odino tinapay, nepeg a poolan; ag nepeg a kanen, ta masanto.
target_text: Nung atin king karni o atin karing tinape a e mepangan karas na ning abak, iti sukat dulukan; e na sukat mapangan, uling iti sagradu.

source_text: Insan mo alaen so amin a taba a kinmulyapot ed saray loob-loob, say sankaabigan a parti na altey, tan saray duaran batuk a pati taba ra, tan poolan mo ran sakey a bagat ed siak diad tapew na altar.
target_text: Kuanan mu ngan ing tabang makabalut karing laman lub, ing pekamasanting nang dake ning ate, at ding aduang batu ampon ing taba ra. Dulukan mu ngan iti king altar bilang ain kanaku.

source_text: Kanen da so inkanad sirimonya na pakapaandiy kasalanan nen akonsagraan ira.
target_text: Sukat dang kanan itang megamit king seremonia ning pangapatawaran kasalanan inyang miyordinan la.

source_text: Diad lolooban na Tuldan Ayamay Katawan so panganan dad saya, a pati saray tinapay ya atilak ed samay baskit.
target_text: King tulid nang pasbul ning Toldang tuknangan ku karin da kanan iti a kayabe da ring tinape mitagan king basket.

source_text: Alam so karni na karniron kalakyan ya inkanad impangikonsagrad kindi Aaron tan saray anak to tan ilambung mo ed sakey a masanton pasen.
target_text: Kuanan mu ing laman ning lalaking tupang megamit king ordinasyun nang Aaron at ding anak na, at ipabukal mu iti king metung a sagradung lugal.

source_text: Say lakin anak nen Aaron, ya onsalat ed sikato a sakey a pari tan onloob ed Tuldan Ayamay Katawan a manlingkur ed Masanton Pasen, et nepeg ya isolung to ra yan kawes ed loob na pitoran agew.
target_text: Ing anak nang Aaron a manalili mismu kang Aaron bilang pari at lulub king Toldang tuknangan ku ban sumuyu kilub ning Banal a Lugal, sukat na lang isulud deting imalan kilub ding pitung aldo.

source_text: Saya so gawaen mo ed kinen Aaron tan saray lalakin anak to diad pangikonsagram ed sikara, pian manlingkur iran papari ed siak.
target_text: Oyni ngeni ing sukat mung daptan kang Aaron at karing anak nang lalaki ban aitalaga mu la bilang paring sumuyu kanaku.

source_text: Balet poolan mod paway na kampo so laman na bakan kalakyan, say katat to tan say pait to; sikatoy bagat a para kasalanan.
target_text: Oneng dulukan mu king lual ning kampu ing laman ning toro, ing balat na, at ding bituka na. Iti maging ain para mipatawaran ing kasalanan.

source_text: Ikanam so sankaabigan ya arina, balet ag mo lalaukan na libadura, diad panggawam na tinapay.
target_text: Gamitan mu ing pekamasanting a arinang trigu, pero alang lebadura at gawa kang tinape singkapan larung olibo.

source_text: Alam so sakey ed saramay karniron kalakyan tan ibagam ed kinen Aaron tan saray lalakin anak to ya itapew dad olo to iray kalimaan da.
target_text: Kuanan me ing metung karing aduang lalaking tupa at sabian mu kang Aaron at karing anak na ing itumpak da la ring gamat da king buntuk na ning tupa.

source_text: Ikargam irad baskit tan ibagat mo rad siak no isaklang mo may bakan kalakyan tan saramay duaran karniron kalakyan.
target_text: Ibili mu la deti king basket at iyain mu la kanaku potang iyain me ing toro at ding aduang lalaking tupa.

source_text: Iyakar mo ra di Aaron tan saray anak to diad lolooban na Tuldan ayaman ko tan ames mo ra onung ed ganggan.
target_text: Ituki me i Aaron at ding anak na king lele na ning pasbul ning Toldang tuknangan ku at karin mu parapat ing seremonia ning pamaglinis.

source_text: Insan mo isolung ed kinen Aaron iray kawes na parisay antikey a taklay a kawes, say ipod, say andokey a kawes ya onlatup ed ipod, say apis na pagew, tan say balkes.
target_text: Kaybat na nita, piblasan me i Aaron karing imalan pari, ing kamisa, ing efod, ing barung makaba a makababo king efod, ing takap-salu, at ing sinturun.

source_text: Patey mo may karniro tan alam so dala to, insan mo isibo ed saray apatiran dapag na altar.
target_text: Paten me ing lalaking tupa; saluran mu ing daya at kaybat ipisik mu karing apat nang suluk ning altar.

source_text: Insan mo alaen so larak a panagpoyuk, ikalbom ed olo to, tan poyukan mo.
target_text: Kaybat, kuanan mu ing larung paglania at itugtug mu iti king buntuk na at lanian me.

source_text: Paasingger mo ray anak to tan solungan mo ra na kawes ya antikey so taklay;
target_text: Ilapit mu la kanita ding anak nang lalaki at pasuluran mu lang kamisa;

source_text: Saray masanton kawes nen Aaron et nepeg ya ipalima ed saray anak to kayari na ipatey to, pian nisolung da ra no sikaray ikonsagra.
target_text: Sukat lang ipamana ding imalan pari a ginamit nang Aaron karing lahi na pangamate na ban isulud da naman potang miyordinan la.

source_text: Tegtegteg mo may karniro; orasan mo ray loob-loob to tan saray sali to tan iyan mo ra ed tapew na olo to tan saray arum a tegteg.
target_text: Kaybat, pangilian me ing lalaking tupa; luglugan mu ing laman lub at pati na ding bitis at ibili mu iti babo nang buntuk, at karing aliwa pang dake a megili.

source_text: Nepeg ya ag balut naoman yan imbagak; no saray totoo et mangisaklang ira na saray bagat a para kareenan, say pagew tan say ulpo na ayep et kayaryan ira na saray papari.
target_text: Sukat mipatupad manibat ngeni at king kapilan pa man iti: potang ding taung pinili ku yayampang da la ring ain-ning-pamisulusulu, ing pitsu, at ing puad ning animal a yayain da mangaintulid ya karing pari.

source_text: No nikonsagra la so pari, say pagew tan say ulpo na karniron kalakyan ya inkanad pangikonsagra et nepeg ya iyapay a nidoma-doman rigalo ed siak tan nibiig a kayaryan na saray papari.
target_text: Potang miyoyordinan ya ing metung a pari, ing pitsu na at puad ning lalaking tupa a magamit para king seremonia ning ordinasyun sukat lang miyain kanaku bilang makabukud a ain, at ya ing ilele bilang dake ra ding pari.

source_text: Poolan mod tapew na altar so intiron karniro a sakey a bagat a popoolan.
target_text: Dulukan me ing lalaking tupa king altar bilang ain-a-kakanan.

source_text: Alam so pagew na sayan karniron kalakyan tan iyapay mon nidoma-doman rigalo ed siak.
target_text: Kuanan me ing pitsu ning lalaking tupa a megamit king panga-ordinan nang Aaron, at iyain me kanaku bilang makabukud a ain.

source_text: Patey mo may karniro, tan mangala ka na daiset a dala to tan iporanis mod gilig na kawanan a kalayagan di Aaron tan saray anak to; iporanis mo met ed saray kawanan a tangan na kalimaan da tan diad saray kawanan a tangan na kasaliyan da.
target_text: Paten me ing lalaking tupa at kuma kang ditak king daya na at ikaskas mu karing pingul nang balugbug a wanan Aaron at ding anak na, at karing tindaragul da ring gamat dang wanan ampon karing tindaragul da ring bitis dang wanan.

source_text: Insan mo ra alaen ed sikara tan poolan mo ra ed tapew na altar diad tapew na samay bagat a popoolan; tan sikato yay kakanen a bagat ed siak.
target_text: Kaybat kuanan mung pasibayu karela, at dulukan mu king altar, babo ning dilukan a ain, bilang ain-a-kakanan a makatalaga kanaku.

source_text: Iyan mo ra yan amin a kakanen ed saray lima nen Aaron tan saray anak to tan paisaklang mo ran sakey a nidoma-doman rigalo ed siak.
target_text: Ibili mu ngan iting pamangan king gamat nang Aaron ampon ding anak na, at iyutus mu karela ing iyain da iti kanaku bilang makabukud a ain.

source_text: Diad sambaskit a tinapay a nisaklang ed siak, mangala ka na sansasakey a tinapay: sakey a tinapay ya inggawad larak na oliba, sakey a tinapay ya ag inggawad larak, tan sakey a kanen a maimpis.
target_text: Kuma kang tunggalan karing atlung uring tinape karing makabasket a miyain kanaku: metung a tinape singkapan larung olibo, metung karetang e singkapan laru, at metung karing tinape maimpis.

source_text: Gerger moy taba na karniron kalakyan, say taba na ikul, say taba na saray loob-loob, say sankaabigan a parti na altey, saray duaran batuk a pati taba ra, tan say kawanan ya ulpo.
target_text: Kuanan mu ing taba ning lalaking tupa, ing taba na king iki at itang makabalut king laman lub, ing pekamasanting nang dake ning ate, ding adua nang batu, ing taba ra, at ing wanan nang puad.

source_text: Mangala ka na daiset a dala a walad altar tan say daiset a larak a panagpoyuk, tan iwalsik mo ra ed saray kawes di Aaron tan saray anak to.
target_text: Kuma kang ditak king dayang atyu king altar at ditak king larung paglania. Ipisik mu iti kang Aaron, king imalan na, karing anak nang lalaki, at karing imalan da.

source_text: Mangala ka na sakey a kilaw a bakan kalakyan tan duaran karniron kalakyan ya anggapoy deral na laman da.
target_text: Kuma kang metung a baintaung toro ampon aduang lalaking tupa a alang kapansanan.

source_text: Saray papari labat so nayarin mangan ed sayan kakanen, lapud masanto yan kakanen.
target_text: Bukud mung ding pari ilang mangan kaniti uling iti sagradu.

source_text: Makapaliket ed siak so balingit na sayan bagat.
target_text: Ing bau na niting ain babie tula kanaku.

source_text: Makapaliket ed siak so balingit na sayan bagat.
target_text: Babie tula kanaku, ing Ginu , ing bau na niti.

source_text: Sayan parti na ayep et kayaryan mo.
target_text: Ing dake nang iti ning animal ya ing para keka.

source_text: Sikato yay rigalod siak a Katawan na saray totoo.
target_text: Iti ya ing peka regalu da ring tau para kanaku, ing Ginu .

source_text: Siak so Katawan a Dios da.
target_text: Aku ing Ginung karelang Dios.

source_text: Igawam ed larak na oliba so arum ya arina, say arum igawam ya anggapoy larak, tan say arum gawam a maimpis a kanen a pinoranisay larak.
target_text: Gawa ka namang e singkapan larung olibo at mapilan pang tinape maimpis a kiskasanan laru.

source_text: Isibom ed apatiran dapag na altar so keran dala.
target_text: Isabug mu ing mitagan a daya karing apat nang suluk ning altar.

source_text: Say keran dala ikalbom ed leksab na altar.
target_text: Kaybat itugtug mu ing makatagan a daya king talpakan ning altar.

source_text: Diad ontan si Aaron, saray anak to, tan saray kawes da et nisaklang iran masanto ed siak.
target_text: Mitalaga ne kanita kanaku i Aaron, ding anak na, at ing imalan da.

source_text: Insan mo lanaan na larak na oliba, pian napasanto.
target_text: Kaybat kuskusan me king larung olibo ban maging sagradu ya.

source_text: Diad ontan magmaliw a sigput a masanto so altar, tan siopaman odino antokaman a makadiwit ed sayan altar et napasakitan, lapud pakayari na inkasanto to.
target_text: Kanita maging lubus yang banal ing altar, at ninuman o nanumang mitagkil kaniti manasakit ya king upaya na ning kabanalan na.

source_text: Saya so kakanen a bagat ed siak a Katawan , tan makapaliket ed siak so balingit to.
target_text: Iti maging ain yang kakanan a miyain kanaku, ing Ginu , at babie tula kanaku ing bau na niti.

source_text: Diman ak miabetan ed saray totoo tan mitongtong ak ed sika.
target_text: Karin ke pakitagpuan ing balen ku at karin ku makipagsalita kekayu.

source_text: Ontan so pangikonsagram ed kinen Aaron tan saray lalakin anak to.
target_text: Makanyan meng ordinan pari i Aaron at ding anak nang lalaki.

source_text: Sikara tan saray kabyangay boleg da et nepeg a manlingkur iran papari ed siak diad ando lan ando.
target_text: Ila at ding maging lahi ra ilang sumuyu kanaku bilang pari king kapilan pa man.

source_text: Diad sayan altar ag kayo mangibabagat na insinson aliwan masanto odino bagat ya ayep odino bagat a trigo, tan ag kayo mangikakalbo dia na bagat ya alak.
target_text: E ye didinan iting altar king insensong e makapaintulut o king nanu pa mang animal a durulukan o nanu pa mang ain-a-kakanan; e ye tutugtuganan nanumang alak a yayain.

source_text: Mangala ka na saray sankaabigan a rikadoanemiran kilo ya onturon mira, taloran kilon ambalingit a kanila, taloran kilon ambalingit a kania,
target_text: Kuma ka karing pekamasanting a paniangkap: labing aduang librang mirang alang samut, anam a librang mabanglung kanela, anam a librang mabanglung kania,

source_text: Balang sakey ed saray totoon bilangen et nepeg a mangiter na nakaukolan a bayar onung ed panagsimbang ed santuario.
target_text: Ing balang metung a miyabe king sensus sukat neng bayaran ing alagang mayayawad, agpang king timbangan na ning santuaryu.

source_text: Ag kayo manggagawa na singa onyan insinson para sikayo.
target_text: E yu pakiapusan para gamitan king sarili yu ing pamangawang insenso king anti kaniting paralan.

source_text: No alaen moy bilang da ray Israelita, balang sakey ed sikara nepeg a dondonen tod siak so bilay to, pian anggapoy ondalan a salot ed sikato legan ya aalaen so bilang na totoo.
target_text: Potang kuma kang sensus da ring memalen na ning Israel, sukat na kung bayaran ning balang katau metung a alaga ban kanita alang salut a malyaring miras king bie na kabang mararapat ing pamagsensus.

source_text: Temek mon singa pinon pulbo so daiset ed sayan insinso, iyakar mod dalem na Tuldan Ayamay Katawan , insan mo ipukapok ed arap na Kaban na Sipanan.
target_text: Dikdikan mung mapinu ing metung nang dake niti, at ibili mu king arap ning Tolda nung nukarin da kayu pakitagpuan.

source_text: Manggawa kay gansan talyasi a panorasan tan say gansan ansagan to.
target_text: Pagawa kang metung a palangganang tangsu a ating talpakan munamang tangsu.

source_text: Say Katawan kuantod kinen Moises,
target_text: Ngana ning Ginu kang Moises,

source_text: Maminsan ed kapag taon gawaen nen Aaron so sirimonya a panlinis ed sayan altar diad pangiporanis tod saray pinagsaklur na altar; say iporanis to et say dala na ayep ya imbagat a pangekal na kasalanan.
target_text: Misan king pabanua sukat neng gampanan Aaron ing seremonia ning pamaglinis keting altar king kapamilatan na ning pamangaskas na karing apat nang sagu king daya ning animal a miyain para king pangapatawaran na ning kasalanan.

source_text: Manggawa ka na insinso, a singa panaggawa na pabalingit.
target_text: Ila deti ring gamitan mu para gawa kang insenso, antimo nung makananu kang gagawang pabanglu.

source_text: Si Aaron tan saray anak ton lalaki et ikana ra yan danum a panoras day lima tan sali ra,
target_text: Iti ing danum a gamitan nang Aaron at ding anak nang lalaki para panos dang gamat at bitis

source_text: Say Katawan kuantod kinen Moises, Mangala ka na nampaparan karakel na onggendan a masamit a rikadoistakti, onika, galbanum, tan puron olibanum.
target_text: Nganang sinabi ning Ginu kang Moises, Kuma kang parehu takal at timbang king balang metung kareting makatuking mabanglung paniangkap: estakte, onika, galbano, at insensong puru.

source_text: Siopamay toon mangalig na inkagawa to odino mangikanad siopaman ya aliwan pari, sikatoy ag la nibilang a sakey ed saray totook.
target_text: Ninumang gawang kalupa na sangkap niti at saka na gamitan iti kenu pa mang e pari, e ne malyaring mibilang pang miembru na ning kanakung balen.

source_text: Say mayaman a too ag nepeg a mambayar na masoluk, tan say mairap-bilay ag nepeg a mambayar na kulang, no sikaray mambayar na panondon dad bilay da.
target_text: E ya kailangan mamayad maygit ing lalaking mabandi, at e ya kailangan mamayad kulang ing lalaking kalulu, potang ibie ra iting alaga a kalibe na ning bie ra.

source_text: kasakbayan iran onloob ed Tulda odino onasingger ed altar a mangisaklang na bagat a kakanen.
target_text: bayu la lungub king Toldang tuknangan ku o kaya bayu la lumapit king altar ban miyain king ain-a-kakanan.

source_text: Ag nepeg ya ikalbo ed ordinarion too, tan ag yo nepeg ya aligen so inkagawa to.
target_text: E sukat mitugtug karing karaniwan a tau at e yu bitasang gagamitan ing pormularyu na niti.

source_text: Ikuanmod saray Israelita, Sayan masanton larak a panagpoyuk et nepeg ya ikana ed panlingkur ed siak diad kapigan man a panaon.
target_text: Sabian mu karing memalen na ning Israel, Manibat ngeni iting banal a larung paglania ya ing sukat magamit king pamaniuyu kanaku king sablang panaun.

source_text: Onya met so gawaen to no selselan to ray lamparaan no labi.
target_text: Makanyan munaman ing daptan na potang sindian na la ding sulu karas ning bengi.

source_text: Insan mo poyukan si Aaron tan saray lalakin anak to tan ikonsagram ira a papari a manlingkur ed siak.
target_text: Kaybat lanian mia naman kaniti i Aaron at ding anak nang lalaki, at italaga mu la bilang pari a sumuyu kanaku.

source_text: Onyay pangisaklang mod saraya, et magmaliw iran sigput a masanto, tan siopaman odino antokaman a makadiwit ed saraya napasakitan lapud pakayari na inkasanto ra.
target_text: Makanyan mu lang italaga kanaku deting sablang bage ban maging lubus lang banal, at manasakit ya king upaya na ning karelang kabanalan ing ninumang tagkil kareti.

source_text: diad altar a panangisaklangan na bagat a popoolan a pati amin a kagawaan to, tan diad talyasi a pati ansagan to.
target_text: king altar a pidurulukan karing ain at ding sabla nang kasangkapan, king palangganang pipanuasan at ing talpakan na.

source_text: Siopamay toon manggawa na kapara to ya, ta ikana ton pabalingit, ag la nibilang a sakey ed saray totook.
target_text: Itiwalag ya karing memalen ku ing ninumang gawang pabanglu king anti kaniting paralan.

source_text: diad lamisaan a pati amin a kagawaan to, diad panangipatoonan na lamparaan a pati kagawaan to, diad altar a panagpoolan na insinso,
target_text: king lamesa, at para karing sablang kasangkapan, king tumpakan-sulu, at karing sablang kasangkapan na, king altar a pidurulukan insenso,

source_text: Ikanam ya a pampoyuk ed Tuldan Ayamay Katawan diad Kaban na Sipanan,
target_text: Gamitan mu iti para paglania king Toldang kanakung tuknangan, king Kaban ning Kasunduan,

source_text: tan manggawa ka na masanton larak a panagpoyuk a singa panaggaway pabalingit.
target_text: at gawa kang larung paglania a singkapan bilang pabanglu.

source_text: Kapag kabwasan no iparaan nen Aaron iray lamparaan, sikatoy nepeg a mamool na ambalingit ya insinso ed tapew na altar.
target_text: Balang abak, potang dirinan na lang laru ding sulu, kailangan ing duluk yang mabanglung insenso i Aaron keting altar.

source_text: tan anemiran kilon kasia asimbang ira yan amin onung ed panagsimbang ed santuario.
target_text: at labing aduang librang kasia agpang king timbangan ning santuaryu.

source_text: Balang sakey a nabilang, salanti say balang lakin mantaon na duamplo a mampaatagey, et nepeg a mangiter ed siak na sayan babayaran.
target_text: Ing balang kataung mabilang king sensus, ngana wari, ing balang lalaking atyu na king idad a aduang pulung banua o maygit kaniti, sukat nang bayaran kanaku ing anti kaniting alaga.

source_text: Nepeg dan orasan so lima tan sali ra, pian ag ira ompatey.
target_text: Kailangan da lang wasan ding gamat da at bitis ban e la mate.

source_text: Say Katawan kuantod kinen Moises,
target_text: Ngana pa ning Ginu kang Moises,

source_text: Say Katawan kuantod kinen Moises,
target_text: Ngana pa ning Ginu kang Moises,

source_text: Iliram yan altar diad paway na kurtinan akabitin ed arap na Kaban na Sipanan.
target_text: Ibili me iting altar king lual ning tabing arapan na ning Kaban ning Kasunduan.

source_text: Nepeg ya akasia ra yan tiken tan okupan mo ra na balituk.
target_text: Gawan mu la king dutung a akasia deting tambayuk, at balutanan mu la namang gintu.

source_text: Alam ira yan kuarta ed saray Israelita tan igastos mo ed panasikaso ed Tuldan Ayamay Katawan .
target_text: Likuman mu la reting salapi karing memalen na ning Israel, at ya ing gastusan mu para king pamaniustentu king Tolda a kanakung tuknangan.

source_text: Manggawa ka na altar ya akasia a panagpoolan na insinso.
target_text: Gawa kang altar a pidulukan insenso; dutung a akasia ing gamitan mu.

source_text: Nepeg a kuadrado; labinwalon pulgada so karokey to tan labinwalon pulgada so kaawang to, tan talomplo tan anem a pulgada so kaatagey to.
target_text: Gawan meng kuadradu; labing walung pulgada ya king kaba, labing walung pulgada ne man king lapad, at atlung pulu't anam a pulgada ya king katas.

source_text: Manggawa kay duaran balituk a liken tan ipeket mo rad duaran dapag diad leksab na moldora tan sikaray pangisolungan ed saray tiken a panagsakbatan.
target_text: Karing mingatba nang dane, lalam ning listun, mikabit kang tiduang telasingsing a gintu para pisuluran karing tambayuk a peka bitbitan na.

source_text: Okupan mo na puron balituk so tagey to, saray apatiran dapag to, tan saray pinagkasaklur to, tan moldoraan mo na balituk iray gilig-gilig to.
target_text: Ing peka mesa na at sanepa at ding sagu na balutanan mu la ngan gintu at dinan listun a gintu king makapadurut.

source_text: Sayan bagat na insinso et mansiansia lawas ya anggan kapigan.
target_text: E yu kakalinguan iting pamiyain insenso aldo-aldo at pati ding maging lahi yu.

source_text: Masanto yan larak; nepeg a masanto so pangipasen yo.
target_text: Iti banal at sukat yung tunggen banal.

source_text: Sayan buis sikatoy bayar a panondon na bilay da, et ag ko ra lingwanan ya iyagel.
target_text: Iting buis ya ing bayad a kalibe na ning bie ra at aku naman e ku la kalinguan.

source_text: Diman so pasen a pangabetan kod sika.
target_text: Iti ing lugal nung nukarin ku makitagpu kekayu.

source_text: Laukan mo na sakey a galon a larak na oliba,
target_text: Idagdag mu kaniti ing metung a galun a larung olibo,

source_text: Diad ontan ag ira ompatey.
target_text: E la mate nung daptan da iti.

source_text: Sayan totontonen nepeg a sumpalen da tan saray kabyangay boleg da ed anggan kapigan a panaon.
target_text: Metung ya iting tuntunan a sukat dang tuparan at ding maging lahi ra king kapilan pa man.

source_text: Balang sakey nepeg a bayaran to ya, tan sakey yan bagat ed siak.
target_text: Kailangan nang bayaran iti ning balang metung at metung bilang ain para kanaku.

source_text: Saray pinagkasaklur ed apatiran suyok to et nepeg a katekep na altar.
target_text: Kailangan ing makasukung la ding peka sagu na karing apat nang suluk niti anting dake na.

source_text: Gawaen ya a tinaon ed kapigan man a panaon.
target_text: Sukat marapat iti misan king pabanua at king kapilan pa man.

source_text: Iliram ed nanleetan na Tulda tan say altar, tan kargaan mo na danum.
target_text: Ibili me iti pilatan na ning Toldang tuknangan ku ila ning altar at dinan meng danum.

source_text: Laukan mo na asin pian mansiansian puro tan masanto.
target_text: Dinan mung asin ban maging puru at banal.

source_text: Ipasen mon sigput a masanto so sayan insinso.
target_text: Tunggen yung banal iting insenso.

source_text: Ipasen yon masanton bengatla a nisaklang ed siak.
target_text: Tunggen yung banal iti uling iti bukud mung para king Ginu .

source_text: Sayan altar et nepeg a sigput a masanto, tan nisaklang ed siak a Katawan .
target_text: Sukat yang lubus banal iting altar a makatalaga para kanaku, ing Ginu .

source_text: Onya so impamalsa na Dios ed saray duaran baleg a silew, say banwa a baleg a silew a manoley no agew tan say bulan a memelag a silew a manoley no labi; pinalsa to met iray bitewen.
target_text: at magsilbi lang sulu king sikluban na ning banua ban aslagan de ing yatu. At ita ing milyari.

source_text: Insan ingganggan na Dios, Sika a dalin, mamawala ka na amin a klasiy mabilay ya ayep, saray amo tan saray atap, saray baleg tan saray melaget agawa.
target_text: Miras ing bengi at dinatang ing abak. Ita ya ing kalimang aldo.

source_text: Onya so impamalsa na Dios ed sarayan amin ya ayayep.
target_text: Kaybat na nita, ngana ning Dios, Paburen yang palto na la ning yatu ding miyayaliwang mabie lelangan: matunud at malyap, mangaragul at mangalati.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Dios, Natan mamalsa tayoy too; gawaen tayo ran kaparparay indengan tayo tan kaolibay tayo.
target_text: Lelangan na la ning Dios ding miyayaliwang animal, ding animal a antimo ding baka at miyayaliwa pang animal a gagapang king yatu.

source_text: Linmabas so labi tan sinmabiy kabwasansikato ya so kumapat ya agew.
target_text: ban sunlag neng aldo at neng bengi at ikawani na ing sala king dalumdum. Ikit na ning Dios king ita mayap.

source_text: Insan ingganggan na Dios, Sikan danum, mamawala ka na amayamay a klasiy mabilay a bengatla, tan sikan liwang, mamawala ka na amayamay a klasiy manok.
target_text: Miras ing bengi at dinatang ing abak. Ita ya ing kapat a aldo.

source_text: Onya so impamalsa na Dios ed saray ankakabaleg a dragon ed dayat, amin a klasiy pinalsa a manaayam ed danum, tan amin a klasiy manok.
target_text: Kanita ngana ning Dios, Lunto la karing danuman ding dakal a mabie lelangan at sulapo la ding ayup lalam na ning banua.

source_text: Onya so impamalsa na Dios ed too; pinalsa to ra a kaparay indengan to.
target_text: Kanita ngana ning Dios, Lalangan ta ya ing tau king wangis tamu.

source_text: Binindisionan to ran amin a kuantod sikara, Sikayo ran pinalsan manaayam ed danum, mamparakel kayo tan pano yoy dayat, tan sikayo ran manok, mamparakel kayo.
target_text: Inya lelangan na la ning Dios ding maragul a asan ning danuman at ding sablang miyayaliwang kakawe king danuman at miyayaliwang ayup. Ikit na ning Dios king ita mayap.

source_text: Linmabas so labi tan sinmabiy kabwasansikato ya so kumaliman agew.
target_text: Binendisyunan na la ning Dios at ngana karela, Magpakarakal kayu at katmuan ye ing dagat; ikayung ayup, magpakarakal kayu naman at katmuan ye ing yatu.

source_text: binindisionan to ra, tan inkuantod sikara, Mamparakel kayoy anak, makmakan yoy intiron mundo, tan oleyan yo. Oleyan yo ray sira, saray manok, tan amin iray ayayep.
target_text: Inya lelangan ne ning Dios ing tau king wangis na; king wangis ning Dios lelangan ne; lelangan na lang lalaki at babai.

source_text: Inter kon tagano yo iray amin a tanaman a mangiter na ilik tan amin a kiew a mambungay prutas a nambokel;
target_text: Bendisyunan na la ning Dios at ngana, Magpakarakal kayu at katmuan ye ing yatu at sakupan ye. Ikayung mamahala karing asan king dagat, karing ayup, at karing heganaganang bage melalang a gagapang king yatu.

source_text: balet inter kod saray ayayep tan saray amin a manok iray dika tan tanaman a tagano raet agawa.
target_text: Ngana pa ning Dios, Lawan yu, babie ku la kekayu ding heganaganang tanaman a ating bini king mabilug a yatu at ing balang tanaman a mamungang ating butul kilub ban maging pamangan yu.

source_text: Ninengneng na Dios iray pinalsa to, et maung a tuloy iran amin. Linmabas so labi tan sinmabiy kabwasansikato ya so kumanem ya agew.
target_text: At babie ku ing sablang berding tanaman karing heganaganang animal, karing sablang ayup, at karing sablang melalang a gagapang king yatu at king balang mabibie king yatu. At ita ing milyari.

source_text: manoley no agew tan labi, tan mangibiig na liwawa ed bilonget. Say Dios anengneng to a maung so agawa.

source_text: Impasen tod tawen ira yan silew a mangiter na liwawa ed dalin,
target_text: Lelangan na la ning Dios ding aduang maragul a sulu; sunlag ya ing maragul kareti kabang aldo at sunlag ya ing malati neng bengi. Lelangan na la naman ding batuin.

source_text: onsilew irad tawen a mangiter na liwawa ed dalinet agawa.
target_text: Kaybat ngana ning Dios, Mika ating sala king banua ban mikawani ya ing aldo king bengi. Maging tanda la karing panaun ampon karing aldo at banua,

source_text: Insan inkuan na Dios, Onlesa ed tawen iray silew a mangibiig na agew ed labi tan mangipanengneng na igapo na saray agew, taon, tan saray panaon;
target_text: Miras ing bengi at dinatang ing abak. Ita ya ing katlung aldo.

source_text: Linmabas so labi tan sinmabiy kabwasansikato ya so kumatlon agew.
target_text: Pepalto na la ning yatu ding miyayaliwang klasing tanaman a ating bini at tanaman a mamungang ating butul kilub. Ikit na ning Dios king ita mayap.

source_text: Pinatubo na dalin iray amin a klasiy tanaman, saray mangiter na ilik, saray mambungay prutas a nambokel.
target_text: Kanita ngana ning Dios, Palto yang miyayaliwang tanaman ing gabun: balang uring tanaman a ating bini at balang uring tanaman a mamunga king yatu a ating butul kilub.

source_text: Insan ingganggan na Dios, Sikan dalin, mamatubo ka na amin a klasiy tanaman, saray mangiter na ilik tan saray mambungay prutas a nambokelet agawa.
target_text: Inaus neng Yatu ning Dios ing gabun, at ing danum a mitipun inaus neng Dagat. Ikit na ning Dios king ita mayap.

source_text: Tinawag to na Dalin so amagan pasen, tan Dayat imay danum ya atipon.
target_text: Kaybat ngana ning Dios, Mitipun ing danum lalam ning banua king metung a lugal ban palto na ing malanging gabun.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Dios, Natipon ed sakey a pasen so danum a walad silong na tawen, pian ompaway so amagan pasenet agawa.
target_text: Inaus neng Banua ning Dios ing suklub. Miras ing bengi at dinatang ing abak. Ita ya ing kaduang aldo.

source_text: Tinawag to na Tawen so liwang. Linmabas so labi tan sinmabiy kabwasansikato ya so kumadwan agew.
target_text: lelangan ne ning Dios ing suklub at kewani na niti ing danum babo na ning suklub king danum lalam na.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Dios, Onlesay liwang a mamalduay danum tan pambiigan tod duaran pasenet agawa.
target_text: Kaybat ngana ning Dios, Mika ating maragul a suklub pilatan da ring danuman ban pikawanian ing danuman.

source_text: tinawag to na Agew so liwawa tan Labi so bilonget.
target_text: Inaus neng Aldo ning Dios ing sala, at ing dalumdum naman inaus neng Bengi.

source_text: anengneng na Dios a maung so liwawa.
target_text: Ikit na ning Dios king mayap ing sala.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Dios, Onlesa so liwawaet linmesay liwawa;
target_text: Ngana ning Dios, Mika ating sala at linto ing sala.

source_text: say mundo anggapoy oksuy tan nengneng to. Ambilbilonget so tapew na manungol a dayat a nilanayapan toy ganagana tan mansiplug so pakayari na Dios ed tapew na danum.
target_text: Ala yang kaayusan ing yatu; tatakpan na ning dalumdum ing kalalalaman kabang tutiup ya ing tutung masikan a angin babo na ning danuman.

source_text: Diad gapoy gapo nen pinalsa na Dios iray katawenan tan say dalin,
target_text: King pasimula, lelangan ne ning Dios ing banua at ing yatu.

source_text: Sikaray manoley ed saray sira, saray manok, tan amin ya ayayep, saray amo tan saray atap, saray baleg tan saray melag.
target_text: Ikit na ning Dios king ita mayap.

target_text: At ita ing milyari.

source_text: Insan imbiig na Dios so liwawa ed bilonget;

target_text: Miras ing bengi at dinatang ing abak. Ita ya ing mumunang aldo.

target_text: At ita ing milyari

source_text: Pinalsa toy laki tan say bii,
target_text: Ila ding manibala karing asan na ning dagat, karing ayup, karing baka, karing heganaganang animal, at karing heganaganang melalang a gagapang king yatu.

source_text: Say Dios anengneng to a maung so agawa.
target_text: At ita ing milyari.

source_text: Bii so ngaran to, ta inala ed laki.
target_text: Iti ing sangkan nung inya ing lalaki lakuan ne i tata na at ima na at makiabe ya king asawa na, at ilang adua maging metung na la mung katawan.

source_text: Walay ilog ya onaagos ed Eden tan sasalugen to may tanamanan; diad paway na Eden nansanga na apatiran ilog.
target_text: Ating metung a ilug king Eden a paranum king mulahan; ibat karin meging apat yang sanga ing ilug.

source_text: Asumpal sirin ya apalsa so tawen tan dalin tan amin a logan da.
target_text: Makanyan na lang inari ning Dios ding banua at ing yatu ampon ing heganaganang atyu kareti.

source_text: Pison so ngaran na onaan ya ilog; onaagos ed kaliber-liber na bansa na Havila.
target_text: Pison ing lagyu na ning mumuna; mamagus ya king mabilug nang gabun ning Havila nung nu ating gintu.

source_text: Dia naalmoy puron balituk, tan pati nidoma-doman pabalingit tan saray ankablin batoy alahas.
target_text: Tutung masanting ing gintu ning lugal a ita; atin munamang bedelio at mal a batung onyx karin.

source_text: Gihon so ngaran na kumadwan ilog; onaagos ed kaliber-liber na bansa na Cus.
target_text: Gihon ing lagyu na ning kaduang ilug; mamagus ya king gabun ning Cus.

source_text: Tigris so ngaran na kumatlon ilog; onaagos ed bandad bokig na Asiria, tan Eufrates so ngaran na kumapat ya ilog.
target_text: Tigris ing lagyu na ning katlu; mamagus ya banda nang aslagan ning Asiria. At ing kapat a ilug ya ing Eufrates.

source_text: Insan say Katawan a Dios inala to may too tan impasen tod tanamanan na Eden, pian nadalusan to tan naasikaso to.
target_text: Binili ne karin ning Ginung Dios ing tau at pepatuknangan ne king mula na ning Eden ban gambulan ne at ingatan.

source_text: Ingganggan tod sikato, Nayarian mon kaney bunga na antokaman a kiew ed tanamanan,
target_text: Nganang minutus ning Ginung Dios king tau, Malyari kang mangan king isanu pa mang tanaman king mulahan,

source_text: balet ag ka mamangan na bunga na samay kiew a mangiiter na pakaamta ed maung tan maoges.
target_text: subali mu ing tanaman na ning beluan tungkul king mayap at e mayap.

source_text: Pinatubo to rad may amin a klasiy mararakep a kiew tan pinabunga to ra na masasamit a prutas. Diad pegley na tanamanan so kawalaan na kiew a mangiiter na bilay, tan say kiew a mangiiter na pakaamta ed maung tan maoges.
target_text: Pepatubuan na la ning Ginung Dios king gabun ding miyayaliwang tanaman a makayamang lalawan at maniaman kakanan at ing tanaman ning bie a atyu libutad na ning mulahan, at ing tanaman ning beluan tungkul king mayap at e mayap.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Katawan a Dios, Aliwan maung a mambukbukor so too.
target_text: Kanita ngana ning Ginung Dios, E mayap ing magdili-dili ya ing lalaki.

source_text: Insan say Katawan a Dios nanggawa na sakey a tanamanan diad bandad bokig a sakop na Eden, tan diman to impanayam imay toon minoli to.
target_text: Kanita mibili yang metung a mulahan ing Ginung Dios karin king Eden, king aslagan, at binili ne karin ing taung inubug na.

source_text: Kanyan nanmoli na dalin tan sayan minoli to ginawa ton ayayep tan manomanok.
target_text: Inya ibat king gabun ing Ginung Dios miyubug yang miyayaliwang animal at miyayaliwang ayup.

source_text: Insan say Katawan a Dios angalay dabuk ed dalin, minoli ton sakey a too-too, insan to iningasan na linawan manangiter na bilay ed saray abut na eleng to, et nagmaliw a mabilay a too.
target_text: Inubug ne ning Ginung Dios ing tau ibat king alikabuk at pengisnawanan ne arung king pangisnawa ning bie, at mika bie ya ing tau.

source_text: Balet pinmaway so danum ed saray sobul tan aparanuman so dalin.
target_text: Oneng atin namang sibul a manibatan king gabun at peparanuman na ing gabun.

source_text: Samay too sirin initdan toy kangaranan iray amin a manok tan ayayep; balet anggapod saraya so manepeg a kaiba to tan katulongan to.
target_text: Dininan na lang lagyu ning lalaki ding heganaganang animal at ding ayup; oneng metung man kareti alang meging karapatdapat maging akayabe na.

source_text: Insan say Katawan a Dios pinaogip toy malmalet imay too; nen naogip, angoyus na sakey ed saray taglang to may laki, insan to kinopit so laman ya angalaan to.
target_text: Inya pepatudturan neng maniaman ning Ginung Dios ing lalaki, at kabang matudtud ya kinua ne ing metung karing tagyang na at sera ne laman ing lugal a pibatan na.

source_text: Ginawa ton bii imay taglang, insan to inyakar ed samay laki.
target_text: Kanita gewa neng babai ning Ginung Dios ing tagyang a kinua na king lalaki. Dela ne king lalaki at

source_text: Inkuanto may laki,
target_text: ngana ning lalaki,

source_text: A, salamat, sikato yan siansiay kaparak.
target_text: Iti kabud ing butul ning kakung butul, at laman ning kakung laman;

source_text: Pokel ya inalad saray pokel ko, tan laman ya inalad laman ko.
target_text: mayaus yang babai, uling ibat ya king lalaki.

source_text: Diad loob na anem agew asumpal na Dios a pinalsa ira yan amin, insan diad kumapiton agew nampainawa ed amin a kimey to.
target_text: Ayari na ning Dios ing dapat na kilub ding anam a aldo, at kaybat pepaynawa ya king kapitung aldo king sablang bage depat na.

source_text: Sikato ya sirin so makasengeg no akin et taynan na laki so ama to tan say ina to tan mikasakey ed asawa to, et magmaliw iran saksakey a laman.
target_text: Lubas ya ing lalaki at ing asawa na, oneng e ra pikarine iti.

source_text: Binindisionan na Dios yan kumapiton agew tan imbiig ton sakey a masanton agew, ta diad sayan agew asumpal toy impamalsa tod ganagana tan nampainawa.
target_text: Binendisyunan ne ing kapitung aldo at gewa neng banal, uling king aldong ita ya pepaynawa king heganaganang dapat na king pamaglalang.

source_text: Onya so istoria na inkapalsa na sansinakuban.
target_text: Ita ya ing istoria na ning pangalalang ning banua at yatu.

source_text: Nen kayari na Katawan a Dios a pinalsa so tawen tan dalin,
target_text: Kanitang lalangan ne ning Ginung Dios ing yatu at ing banua,

source_text: anggapo ni ray tanaman ed dalin odino bokel a tinmubo, lapud ag to ni pinaoran, tan anggapoy toon ondalus ed dalin.
target_text: alang nanu pa mang tanaman king yatu at ala pang dikut a tutubu king marangle, uling e ya pa pepauran ing Ginung Dios king yatu at ala pang taung manasik king gabun.

source_text: Insan to ra inyakar ed samay too, ta nengnengen to no antoy pangingaran tod sikara.
target_text: Dela na la king lalaki ban lawan na nung nanung iyaus na kareti.

source_text: Igawaan ko na sakey a manepeg a kaiba to tan katulongan to.
target_text: Lalang kung karapatdapat a akayabe na.

source_text: Ag nepeg a kanen so bunga na saman a kiew; ta no kanen mo, ompatey ka diad agew a pangan mo.
target_text: E ka mamangan king bunga na ning tanaman a ita. Mate ka kabud mengan ka king bunga na.

source_text: No antoy impanawag tod balang sakey, sikatoy ngaran to.
target_text: Ing lagyung binie na king balang metung kareti ya ing meging lagyu na.

source_text: Nakaukolan moy manlinget tan mansagput na baleg, pian makaiter so dalin na antokaman a napambilay ya anggad ipatey tan ipawil mod dalin a nanlapwan mo. Nanlapu kad dalin, tan magmaliw ka lamet a dalin.
target_text: Mika pamangan ka kapamilatan na ning tulu ning pawas mu angga king magbalik ka king gabun nung nu ka ibat, uling king gabun ka ibat, king gabun ka naman mibalik.

source_text: Inmebat imay bii, Nayarian min kanen so bunga na dinanman a kiew ed tanamanan,
target_text: Pekibat na ning babai king ubingan, Malyari keng mangan karing bunga da ring tanaman king mulahan;

source_text: Kanyan say Katawan a Dios pinataynan tod tanamanan na Eden imay too, pian nadalusan toy dalin a nanlapwan na laman to.
target_text: Inya tinabi ne ning Ginung Dios ing tau king Mula ning Eden ban tamnan ne ing gabun a penibatan na.

source_text: Kapangan da, naitdan iray pakatalus tan naamtaan da a labus-lakseb ira; kanyan nandadait iray bolung na igos, insan da intapi-tapi.
target_text: Kanita mu rin mibuklat la mata at ikit da ing lubas la. Inya pitungi da la ring bulung higera ban takpan ing sarili da.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Katawan a Dios, Nagmaliw la a singa sakey ed sikatayo so too, tan wala lay pakaamta tod maung tan maoges.
target_text: Kanita ngana ning Ginung Dios, Oyni ing tau; meging kalupa ta ne. Balu na na ing mayap at ing e mayap.

source_text: Insan say Katawan a Dios nanggawa na saray kawes a katat a para si Adan tan samay asawa to, tan kinawesan to ra.
target_text: Ginawa yang imalan ing Ginung Dios a ibat king balat animal at piniblasan na la.

source_text: Eva so impangingaran nen Adan ed samay asawa to, ta sikatoy ina na amin a katoowan.
target_text: Pemalagyuan neng Eva ning lalaki ing asawa na uling ya ing meging ima na ning meto ketawan.

source_text: Say oleg so sankasiliban ed saray amin ya ayayep a pinalsay Katawan a Dios.
target_text: Ngeni, ing ubingan ya ing mautak dili karing animal a lelangan na ning Ginung Dios.

source_text: Patuboen to ray dika-rika tan sabisabit, tan mangan ka ray tantanaman a balang.
target_text: Palto yang dikut at tanaman a masuksuk at mangan kang tanaman gubat.

source_text: Anengneng na samay bii a marakerakep imay kiew tan masamsamit a kanen so bunga to, tan sakey a pampilpilalekan a pakagamuray kakabatan.
target_text: Ikit na ning babai king masanting yang lalawan ing tanaman at maniaman yang kanan a bunga at dapat yang pagnasan uling babie yang kabiasnan.

source_text: Inkuantod samay laki, Dinengel moy asawam tan kinan moy prutas ya imbagak ed sikan ag mo kanen. Lapud sayan ginawam, nisambay dalin.
target_text: Ngana namang sinabi king lalaki, Uling mekiramdam ka king asawa mu at mengan king bunga ning tanaman a binawal kung kanan mu, misumpa ya ing gabun uli mu.

source_text: Imbagay Dios itan ta amta to a no kanen yo, magmaliw kayon singa Dios ya amta yo no anto so maung tan maoges.
target_text: Balu na ning Dios king kabud mangan kayu maging anti kayung Dios at mibuklat kayu mata, at abalu yu ing mayap at ing e mayap.

source_text: Inkuanto natan ed samay bii, Aruman koy gunigon mo no manlokun ka tan nairapan ka ed pananak mo.
target_text: Ngana naman king babai, Dagdagan ku ing kasakitan mu king kekang pamanganak; king sakit ibait mu la ding anak mu.

source_text: Inkuanto may oleg, Aliwan tua tan; ag kayo ompatey.
target_text: Oneng ngana ning ubingan king babai, E tutu yan. E kayu mate!

source_text: Pambosulan ta ka tan samay bii; mambosulan lawas so anak mo tan say anak to.
target_text: Mikasama kayu ning babai; milaban la ding anak na at ding anak mu.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Katawan a Dios ed samay oleg, Nadusa ka lapud sayan ginawam; sika labat so nisamba ed amin da ray ayayep. Saya so dusam: Manlapud natan manilak-ilak ka, tan say dabuk so kanen mo legan mon mambilay.
target_text: Kanita ngana ning Ginung Dios king ubingan, King gewa mung yan misumpa ka; karing heganaganang animal ika mung bukud ing misumpang anti kaniti: manibat ngeni gumapang ka king kapamilatan na ning kekang atian at alikabuk ing kekang kanan kabang mabie ka.

source_text: Inmebat imay bii, Pinalikdo ak na samay oleg, et angan ak na samay bungay kiew.
target_text: Pekibat ning babai, Lininlang na ku ning ubingan, inya mengan ku.

source_text: Tinepet na Katawan a Dios ed samay bii, Akin et ginawam so ontan?
target_text: Kanita kitang na ning Ginung Dios king babai, Obat gewa mu ing anti kanyan?

source_text: Inmebat imay laki, Samay biin inter mon kaibak et inter tod siak imay bunga, insan ko kinan.
target_text: Pekibat na ning lalaki, Ing babaing binie yung maging kayabe ku ya ing minie king bunga na ning tanaman kanaku at pengan ke.

source_text: likud ed bunga to may kiew a walad pegley to.
target_text: subali mu king bunga na ning tanaman a atyu king libutad ning mulahan.

source_text: Tinepet na Dios, Siopay angibagad sikan labus-lakseb ka?
target_text: Kanita kitang na ning Dios, Ninu waring sinabi kekang lubas ka?

source_text: Inmebat imay laki, Arengel ta kad tanamanan; antakot ak ta labus-lakseb ak, kanyan inamutan ta ka.
target_text: Pekibat na, Dimdam da kayu king mulahan, oneng tatakut ku uling lubas ku. Inya sinalikut ku.

source_text: Balet tinawag na Katawan a Dios imay laki, Iner so kawalaan mo?
target_text: Kanita inaus ne ning Ginung Dios ing lalaki at kitnan ne, Nu ka karin?

source_text: Nen ngarngarem la arengel da so tanul na panaakar na Katawan a Dios ed tanamanan, kanyan inamutan dad otel na kakiewan.
target_text: Inyang damdaman deng lalakad king mulahan ing Ginung Dios king marimla nang dake ning patingapun, sinalikut ya ing lalaki at ing asawa na king Ginung Dios libutad ding tanaman ning mulahan.

source_text: Diad bandad bokig na tanamanan na Eden angipasen na saray kirubin tan sakey a mandarlang ya ispada a manwasiwas ed amin a dapag, pian anggapoy makaasingger ed samay kiew na bilay.
target_text: Tinabi ne king mulahan ing tau at dela ne king bandang aslagan na ning Mula ning Eden at mibili yang kerubin at metung a espadang milalablab mamarap nu man karin ban magbante king dalan papunta king tanaman na ning bie.

source_text: Tinepet na oleg ed samay bii, Imbaga tan tua na Dios ya ag yo kanen so bunga na dinanman a kiew ed tanamanan?
target_text: Nganang mengutang ning ubingan king babai, Tutu pin king binawal na kayung mangan ning Dios king isanu pa mang bungang tanaman king mulahan?

source_text: Kinan mo sirin imay bunga ya imbagak ed sikan ag mo kanen?
target_text: Mengan ka king bunga na ning tanaman a binawal kung kanan mo?

source_text: Imbagay Dios ed sikami ya ag mi kanen odino diwiten so bunga to man a kiew; no kanen mi o diwiten mi, ompatey kami.
target_text: Sinabi na ning Dios king e mi ya kakanan a bunga ni tatagkilan man. Kabud daptan yu ita, ngana, mate kayu.

source_text: Temeken na anak to so olom tan ketketen mo so mokur da.
target_text: Lasawan de ring anak na ing buntuk mu, at tuktukan mu no man ding sakung da.

source_text: Anggaman ontan, pampilalekan mo nin siansiay asawam tan sikatoy manoley ed sika.
target_text: Makanyan man pagnasan me pa mu rin ing asawa mu at pailalam ka king upaya na.

source_text: Nakaukolan a mansagput kay baleg legan mon mambilay, pian mangiter so dalin na malaem a taganom.
target_text: Kailangan kang magal ba mung apangan ing bunga na kabang mabie ka.

source_text: Kanyan amorbor na bunga, insan to kinan. Initdan toy asawa to, tan kinan to met.
target_text: Inya kinangwa ya karing bunga na at pengan ne; dininan nia naman ing asawa na at mengan ya.

source_text: Nakaukolan a sebelan a mangala na bungay kiew na bilay, ta no mangala tan mangan, mambilay ya anggad angga.
target_text: Inya e ya sukat mipaintulutan kumang bunga king tanaman na ning bie at mangan kaniti at e mate kapilan man.

source_text: No maung so ginawam, manimimis ka komun; balet lapud maoges so ginawam, say kasalanan et sisiliban to kan tekmelan. Labay to kan oleyan, balet nepeg mon taloen.
target_text: Nung mayap ing gewa mu, sukat kang tumula; nung e mayap, ing kasalanan manaya ya lele mung pasbul; pagnasan na ka, oneng sukat meng sambutan.

source_text: Inkuanen Lamec ed saramay asawa to,
target_text: Nganang Lamec karing asawa na,

source_text: Inkuanen Cain ed Katawan , Ambelat a tuloy yan dusa; ag ko nasungdoan.
target_text: Nganang Cain king Ginu , Kabayat nang pusanan niting binie yung parusa!

source_text: No ondalus ka, anggapoy naanim; magmaliw kan anggapoy abung tan akar-akar ka diad tapew na dalin.
target_text: Mananaman ka man, oneng ala yang ibie pupul ing gabun; ala kang pupulan. Maglibut-libut ka king mabilug a yatu at e ka malyaring mipaindatun nu man karin.

source_text: Insan inkuanen Cain ed kinen agi ton Abel, Mamasyar ta ed kaalogan.
target_text: Misan a aldo, nganang Cain kang Abel a kapatad na, Tara, munta kata king marangle.

source_text: balet ag akaliket ed kinen Cain tan samay bagat to.
target_text: Oneng e ya metula kang Cain at king ain a darala na.

source_text: Nisamba ka; ag mo la nadalusan so dalin a singa inlokas toy sangi to nen inesep toy dala na agim a pinatey mo.
target_text: Manibat ngeni makasumpa ka at mitabi ka king gabun a mistulang asbuk a mininum king dayang pepatulu mu king kapatad mu.

source_text: Insan angyakar met si Abel na kordiron besag na sakey ed saray karniro to, pinatas to, tan imbagat to ray sankaabigan a parti.
target_text: I Abel naman migdala yang metung karing pangane biseru karing tupa na, at inain na ing masanting diling dake.

source_text: Kalabas na pigaran taon, angyakar si Cain na pigaran naani to tan imbagat tod Katawan .
target_text: Dinatang ing aldo at i Cain migdala yang aibie na king Ginu ibat king bunga na ning gabun.

source_text: Insan inkuan na Katawan , Akin et onyay ginawam?
target_text: Kanita ngana ning Ginu , Obat gewa mu ing anti kanyan?

source_text: Et nananak lamet na sakey a laki a si Abel.
target_text: Beit ne ing metung pang anak a lalaki.

source_text: Inkuan na Katawan ed kinen Cain, Akin et mamapasnuk ka?
target_text: Ngana ning Ginu kang Cain, Obat mua ka?

source_text: Inmebat, Ag ko amta.
target_text: E ke balu, nganang mekibat.

source_text: Inakdulan nen Adan si Eva ya asawa to. Nanlokun si Eva tan nananak na sakey a laki.
target_text: Sipingnan neng Adan ing asawa nang i Eva at mebuktut ya, at beit ne i Cain.

source_text: Tinepet na Katawan ed kinen Cain, Kawalaan nen Abel ya agim?
target_text: Kanita nganang mengutang ning Ginu kang Cain, Nukarin ya ing kapatad mung i Abel?

source_text: Pitomplo tan pito a totoo so pateyen a
target_text: Mikayanak yang metung a lalaki i Set, at pemalagyuan neng Enos. Kanita la megumpisang minaus ding tau king lagyu na ning Ginu king karelang pamanyamba.

source_text: pinagkabales na impamatey ed kinen Cain,
target_text: Pasibayu neng sipingnan Adan ing asawa na, at menganak yang lalaki at pemalagyuan neng Set. Dininan na kung aliwang anak ning Dios, nganang Eva, bilang kalibe nang Abel a pete nang Cain.

source_text: No pitoran totoo so pateyen a
target_text: ing kang Lamec naman makatapitung pulu't pitung besis.

source_text: ta kinabil to ak a sinugatan.
target_text: Nung ing makamate kang Cain makatapitu yang besis miparusan,

source_text: Pinatey koy sakey a lakin tubon-balo,
target_text: Pete ke ing metung a kayanakan uli ning penasakit na ku.

source_text: Patataynanen mo ak ed dalin tan diad arap mo. Magmaliw ak ya anggapoy abung tan akar-akar diad tapew na dalin, tan pateyen ak na siopaman a makalmod siak.
target_text: Palakuan yu ku king gabun a iti at mabating ku ban e yu na ku akit; maglayas-layas kung alang tuknangan king lupa na ning yatu, at paten na ku ning ninumang manakit kanaku!

source_text: Balet inmebat so Katawan , Andi!
target_text: E makanyan, ngana ning Ginu kang Cain.

source_text: Ada tan Zilla, dengel yo ak
target_text: Ada at Zilla, pakiramdaman yu ku!

source_text: Inyanak nen Zilla si Tubal-cain a nanggawa na amin a klasiy kagawaan a gansa tan balatyang.
target_text: Beit neng Zilla i Tubal-Cain a pipumpunan da ring taung biasang gawa karing kasangkapan a tangsu at bakal.

source_text: Say agi to si Jubal a sengeg na boleg da ray managtogtog na arpa tan plauta.
target_text: Jubal ne man lagyu ing kapatad na; ya naman ing pipumpunan da ring sablang manigtigan lira at plauta.

source_text: Inyanak nen Ada si Jabal a sengeg na boleg da ray totoon walaan na ayayep tan diad saray tulda so panaayaman da.
target_text: Beit neng Ada i Jabal; ya ing pipumpunan da ring taung manuknangan karing tolda at manese animal antimo ding baka.

source_text: Duaray inasawa nen Lamec, si Ada tan si Zilla.
target_text: Adua ya asawa i Lamec; i Ada at i Zilla.

source_text: Walay lakin anak nen Enoc a manngaray Irad ya ama nen Mehujael, say ama nen Metusael ya ama nen Lamec.
target_text: I Irad ya ing meging anak nang Enoc, at meging anak na ne man Irad i Meuyael. Anak neng Meuyael i Metusael, at anak neng Metusael i Lamec.

source_text: Tinmaynan si Cain ed arap na Katawan tan nanayam ed dalin a tatawagey Akar-akar, diad bokig na Eden.
target_text: Meko ya i Cain king arapan na ning Ginu at menuknangan ya king sakup ning Nod, king dane nang aslagan ning Eden.

source_text: Inakdulan nen Cain so asawa to, et nanlokun tan inngaran toy Enoc.
target_text: Sipingnan neng Cain ing asawa na; mebuktut ya at beit ne i Enoc.

source_text: Insan amaalagey na siudad si Cain tan inngaran tod ngaran na sayan anak to.
target_text: Telakad neng Cain ing metung a siudad, at pekilagyu ne iti king anak nang i Enoc.

source_text: Say biin agi nen Tubal-cain et si Naama.
target_text: Naama ya lagyu ing kapatad nang babaing Tubal-Cain.

source_text: Nen wadman la ra, tinekmelan nen Cain si agi to tan pinatey to.
target_text: Minta la king marangle at kabang atyu la karin, lepitan neng Cain i Abel at pete ne.

source_text: No walay mamatey ed sika, pitoran totoo so pateyen a pinagkabales to.
target_text: Itang makamate keka, makatapitu yang besis miparusan.

source_text: Diad tulong na Katawan , kuanen Eva, akaanak ak na sakey a laki.
target_text: Ngana, Mikayanak kung metung a lalaki king saup na ning Ginu .

source_text: Siak tay managasikasod agik?
target_text: Aku wari ing talaingat king kapatad ko?

source_text: Nagmaliw a pumapastol si Abel, balet sakey a dumaralus si Cain.
target_text: Abel ing lagyu na. Pastul ya i Abel at i Cain naman ortelanu ya.

source_text: Manlapud dalin, manakakis ed siak so dala na agim; singa bosis ya onkekerew na bales.
target_text: Kukulait kanaku ibat king gabun ing daya na ning kapatad mu.

source_text: Akaliket so Dios ed kinen Abel tan samay bagat to,
target_text: Metula ya ing Ginu kang Abel at king daralan nang ain.
